Message.Title: MSFT should get it over with and buy DELL ...
Message.Msg: 1) Both are business centric 2) MSFT wants to be more like AAPL, which presumably means they will be making more of their own hardware. 3) There appear to be synergies as both evolve (ie. Cloud services). 4) DELL appears under-valued right now based upon the sum of its parts. Can't help feeling DELL would be a good fit for MSFT overall. Just an opinion ... not trying to start any rumors.

Message.Title: Dell EPS This Thursday Should Not Disappooint!!! $11 Soon Again!!

Topic.Title: MSFT should get it over with and buy DELL ...

Message.Msg: Dell is prime for a buyout for sure. MS would be good, but maybe HP or even IBM. But they need to consolidate to compete.

Message.Title: Microsoft didn't buy Creative Labs for MP3 etc...
Message.Msg: That lead Apple to dominate the market. They will not buy Dell either. But will Dell and Hpq will really disappear, leaving No-More US PC business?(other than Apple) Still, it is nut for Dell to drop over 1% on an Up market in both Dow and Nasdaq.
